title: Connection issues with new patch
body: Anyone else having normal ping, no lag, but getting dc every minute for no apparent reason?

replies.body: I've been having similar issues where, post patch, my comp has dropped all fps to about 8. so I turned down the graphics to the minimum and can run on a solid 20 fps. I've since checked my divers and reinstalled all of them. my other apps are fine, but I'm having issues with the launcher specifically. it sends me a crash notice almost everytime I open it.{{item:3070}}

There haven't been any issues with the servers, but it does sound like you might be having a network problem staying connected to the game.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions.
